analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#158-180):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#174-177)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#178)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#179)
	- tierTotal (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#179)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#158-180) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#174-177)

Crowdsale.destroy (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#236-240) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#158-180):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#174-177)
	External calls sending eth:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tierNum (/unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#179)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.11', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- /unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#3-5 declares pragma solidity^0.4.11
	- /unique_contracts/0x26436e73fdd02adde8ae7ab61fa660d6f7926e6f.sol#14-18 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
